Warren Wheat (born May 13, 1967) is an American former professional football guard. He played for the Seattle Seahawks in 1989 and 1991. Wheat played college football at Brigham Young University and was selected by the Los Angeles Rams in the eighth round of the 1989 NFL draft with the 215th overall pick.
